alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta; Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Smoke Advisory issued June 30 at 9:59PM AKDT until July 01 at 9:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE SMOKE ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility limited to one quarter mile or less at times in dense smoke. * WHERE...Lower Kuskokwim Valley and Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Travel may be difficult due to low visibility. Persons with respiratory problems may have difficulty breathing when outside. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty southwesterly winds have advected wildfire smoke across the Lower Kuskokwim Valley. Satellite imagery confirms the worst smoke is located from Lower Kalskag to Crooked Creek.
info.instruction: A dense smoke advisory means widespread fires will create smoke, limiting visibilities. Persons with respiratory illnesses should remain indoors to avoid inhaling smoke. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
